Producer: Mark Amin, Cami Winikoff, Robin Schorr, David Welch
Synopsis: Dan Millman (Scott Mechlowicz) is a gifted athlete whose desire for success drives everything he does. When a mysterious stranger (Nick Nolte) opens Dan's eyes to a new vision of strength and understanding, the Olympic hopeful finds that he still has much to learn and more sacrifices to make.
Title: Peaceful Warrior
